scripts.selectors:refresh:hdfc: rm -rf ./hdfc-form-selectors-raw ./formsJson.new && node scripts/extract-hdfc-form-selectors.mjs --headful --out ./hdfc-form-selectors-raw && node scripts/organize-hdfc-form-selectors.mjs --in ./hdfc-form-selectors-raw --out ./formsJson.new && rm -rf ./formsJson && mv ./formsJson.new ./formsJson && rm -rf ./hdfc-form-selectors-raw
